pageTitle: DDO Request guide at Treasury.ap.gov.in | letmeget.com
textBeforeTable: List of Drawing Officers: If you want reconciliation report then you have to enter DDO code. DDO Reconciliation: If you want to claim for DDO then you have to go at Treasury.ap.gov.in. You have to enter your DDO code, password and then click on “submit” option. If you want to reset your password then you can click on reset option. DDO Claim: Reconciliation of the receipts and expenditure of the department Preparation of budget estimates for respective departments Exercise treasury control over all departmental financial transactions with reference to the Budget Payment of government securities such as stock certificates, bearer bonds, promissory notes and income tax deductions Ensure safe custody of valuable articles such as election boxes, examination papers, departmental cash chests, treasure trove Payment of pensions Conducting cash transactions through non-banking treasuries and banks Conducting financial transactions of the government such as payment of salaries, and other payments Processing pension cases of the respective departments, and more Maintenance of civil, local funds, and personal deposit accounts The main functions of the Directorate of Treasuries and Accounts are: Treasury.ap.gov.in is the official website of AP Treasury. You can do budget request, DDO claims and DDO request at Treasury.ap.gov.in. The information of DDO request at Treasury.ap.gov.in is provided below. Twitter FaceBook DDO Request guide
textAfterTable: To get more List of Drawing Officers.
